item.title: Audio News for March 2nd through the 8th, 2025
item.description: News items read by Laura Kennedy include: Ancient irrigation system in southern Iraq; DNA study highlights Celtic languages; ceramic “puppets” in El Salvador; and oldest bone tools from Olduvai Gorge. Feed: http://www.archaeologychannel.org/rss/TACfeed.xml

item.title: 926. Oral Storytelling Traditions and the Mental Health Benefits of Listening to Podcasts ☀️????
item.description: The other day I was thinking about how podcasts must be good for your mental health, and how this could be connected to the tradition of collective oral communication which was the first form of mass media in most human civilisations, and how this has been central to human psychological and cultural development over the years. So, I made this podcast episode about it. Expect discussion of culture, history, psychology and communication, with plenty of vocabulary explained... Feed: https://access.acast.com/rss/62b0ada25c7ea10012f541cb/
